statusLine.command: bash -c 'input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".workspace.current_dir"); if [ "$cwd" = "$HOME" ]; then dir="~"; else dir=$(echo "$cwd" | sed "s|^$HOME|~|"); fi; git_info=""; if git -C "$cwd" rev-parse --git-dir > /dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git -C "$cwd" branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || git -C "$cwd" rev-parse --short HEAD 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$branch" ]; then if ! git -C "$cwd" diff --quiet 2>/dev/null || ! git -C "$cwd" diff --cached --quiet 2>/dev/null; then git_info=" $(printf "\033[33m")\ue0a0 ${branch}*$(printf "\033[0m")"; else git_info=" $(printf "\033[32m")\ue0a0 ${branch}$(printf "\033[0m")"; fi; fi; fi; printf "\033[2m\033[36m%s\033[0m%s" "$dir" "$git_info"'
